answers.answer: I been going through this, I am 36+2. I was in hospital when the cramps woke me up. They put me on monitor & it was contractions.  The dr said at this point she expects that to be happening. I also have mild preeclampsia and am on bedrest and having c section friday aug. 1. I hope this helps. Oh I dont know what is causing this leg pain but I have that also

question: I woke up at 6am with a cramping feeling. I'm not sure why but its been going on for 7 hours now... I dont believe they're contractions because they don't come and go. They've been steady, same way it would feel if you were to get your period and also my legs are sore and in pain. Not sure what this is?
title: 36+1weeks! Cramps :(
